s = s + 'a' -> O(N) -> access whole string
s += 'a' -> O(1) -> not accesssing whole string

stringstream

- input from string

string s = "12  13    24";
stringstream ss(s);
cout << ss.str << endl;
int a, b, c; ss >> a >> b >> c;
//alternate
while (ss >> n) {
        cout << n << endl;
}
//separate words from string
getline(cin, s);
stringstream ss(s);
while (ss >> n) {
        cout << n << endl;
}

string(int, char) n=3, c=’a’ => “aaa”

char c = num + '0' int num = 'c' - '0'

https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/cpp-string-functions/
